phrases: Why is it so hot every day?
When it is this hot in summer, I want to go to the ocean!
YOU-Uh... I have never been to the ocean, so I am not sure.
My family lived deep in the mountains, so...
Those all have to do with food.
Let us all go to the ocean this weekend!
If you insist, I guess I do not mind going with you.
Is not the ocean dangerous because of shark attacks?
This is not some panic movie.
I can go to the ocean without worrying, then.
But animals tend to like you, Hina-chan.
Maybe they will come to you when you are swimming...
Kuu-chan, if it comes to it, leave me behind and run!
But if you are scared of the ocean, cannot you just play on the beach?
But if I am going to the ocean, I would like to swim.
Actually, I do not even have a swimsuit...
Then let us go buy swimsuits after school.
I have been wanting a new one!
Will I be able to pick a swimsuit that works for me?
I do not know what kind is in right now...
You can just leave that to me!
I will pick the perfect swimsuit for you, Hina-chan!
Are not the second-year classrooms upstairs?
I felt I was being called.
So this is a department store!
This is my first time shopping with friends,
It will be my first time in the swimsuit department, so I am excited, too!
And how about this flowery one?
And this chic style is nice, too!
I want to try it on!
You are going to disturb the other customers.
Mayu-chan, there are so many, I cannot decide!
I know, but do not worry.
I will give all my effort to helping you choose a swimsuit.
All right, try this one next.
How many more is she going to make me try on?
It suits you, but I am surprised that was your choice.
I thought you would pick a more revealing one.
I have gained a little weight lately,
so I want to cover my stomach.
I really was planning to buy a bikini, but...
With your proportions, I think you are perfectly thin now.
You do not need to worry.
Hearing that from you makes me more confident!
I am going to try on a bikini right now!
This one's kind of a funny shape.
Is this the first time you have worn one like that?
I have never worn anything but school swimsuits.
Then we were right to go swimsuit shopping today!
No high schooler wants to go to the ocean wearing a school swimsuit.
I am planning to go in my school swimsuit.
The one I used in elementary school still fits,
so I do not see the need to buy one.
Mayu-chan, I still have my swimsuit from last year, so I
You have to buy a new one, Aki-chan!
You look so composed and beautiful in a swimsuit, Miss Landlady!
You do like simple styles, do not you, Aki-chan?
I figure I could wear something like this at home, too.
Or, like, when I clean the bath.
You use yours on normal days?
I only wear a swimsuit a few times in a year, so it is wasted otherwise.
I am not sure if that is economical or realistic...
Now that everyone else is done picking swimsuits,
I should pick one for myself, too...
My, what a cute little girl!
I am sure any swimsuit would look good on you.
I-I will go get my mom.
I am... I am not a child...
If that is how it is,
I will show off how grown-up I can look with a sexy swimsuit!
Well, I tried to pick one,
but I do not think this is quite right...
I do not think you are ready for that kind of swimsuit yet.
Stop treating me like a child!
I wonder why you can only have up to 500 yen for your snacks on field trips...
I hear people ask if bananas count as snacks all the time, but why does that come up?
Because they are cheap and there is more than one?
Does that mean that it counts as a meal since it fills you up?
-I guess it does not really matter, but I am curious...
I ended up getting a one-piece.
I hope it will not look too childish.
Oh, sorry to keep you all waiting.
worried about how small you are?
I am insecure about that, too.
Yua-chan worries about her height, too?
I do not think you are small enough that you need to worry.
I would say you are about average, actually.
But I am only an A-cup...
I cannot wait to go to the ocean!
I got a really nice swimsuit, too.
I am excited to go swimming!
I am going to eat you, Hina-chan!
A-Actually, I think I might be scared of the ocean...
I am so excited to go to the ocean.
That is right... it is going to be my first time at the ocean, so just in case...
I guess she is practicing what to do in case of drowning.
Let us hurry and go swimming!
We need to make sure we stretch first.
Do you know how to swim?
Yes, though I am not very good at it.
Of course she is a good swimmer!
Did not you swim in a tournament as an emergency substitute and win?
I am surprised you know about that.
Oh, I just happened to see a photo of it outside the swim team's club room...
but if I get caught in a current, my feet will not touch the bottom!
So would not that mean you cannot swim?
Let us just go swim now!
That is it, that is it.
I am going to go buy some drinks.
Kuu-chan is always treating me like a child.
I am the shortest in the group,
but I am still a year older than she is.
She should rely on me more...
I need to contact Aki-chan somehow...
But I left my cell phone back there.
That little girl is out here alone?
But she does not look like an ordinary little girl...
Um... Sensei, what are you doing here?
I am filming a drama near here.
I am waiting for my next scene now, so I took a walk.
Are you appearing in the drama, too?
I thought you had entered show business.
I always thought it was a terrible shame for someone
as sweet and beautiful as you not to strive for a job in show business.
Since fate somehow brought us together here,
why do not you take this opportunity to enter show business?
are the girls you are usually with not here today?
Actually, they are here, but I have lost sight of them.
Could it be that you are...
We do not need to contact Chiaki-san, I take it?
Mayu-chan sure is taking a while.
For the time being, which direction did you come from?
Um... I think it was that way...
Should we have them make a lost child announcement?
That might embarrass Mayu-senpai so much that she would not come back.
We have no way to contact her!
I will go look for her!
I think we are about to have a second lost child on our hands.
I have looked so much, and still cannot find her...
Where in the world did she go?
Maybe she got scouted by someone in show business who happened to be here,
and they took her to the scene of a drama filming?!
As cute as she is, I can believe it...
Could you take a picture of us?
They are all coming to her!
Now I can get back to the others!
I am so glad to see you!
I was so scared all by myself!
I cannot tell which of them was actually lost.
Mayu-chan and Hina-chan still are not back.
You ran into Mayu-chan while taking a walk.
I was worried, since you left your cell phones here!
I am surprised you made it back without losing your way.
The crabs showed me the way.
I like mountain animals, too, but marine animals are really cute!
Some people talked to me and I turned into a scarecrow,
but then Mayu-chan happened to walk by and saved me!
It is so cool that you helped Hina-chan when she was in trouble!
You are like an older sister we can all count on!
Th-That is not true at all.
We will not tell anyone that she really was lost.
And the sea breeze feels nice.
It was so fun playing with everyone, too.
Hina-chan, how was your first visit to the ocean?
I wish I could live here forever!
Are you animals from the mountains?
I love all of you, too.
-New students welcoming party -Welcoming party at the karaoke place near school -Dinner near the karaoke place -Planning to finish at 19:30 -Get RSVPs and make reservations

-Confirm what time everyone plans to go home -Think about the event -Come up with next year's club budget -This month's club report -Ideas on what we want to show the first-years (by 4/15) -Party: 12 with student discount = 1080 yen per person -Dinner: Do we go with a 2 hour all-you-can-eat?
Or eat something we all want?
Let us all take a picture together!
I am starting to feel sleepy, too...
I hope we can all come to the ocean together again next year.
My first visit to the ocean was so much fun!
But I cannot just play around all the time.
I have to help Kuu-chan and Mayu-chan at work,
and I have to study theater, too.
